A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 51607

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: John O. Peters research files, 2010-2013

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John O. Peters research files, 2010-2013. Accession 51607. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Historical Society of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: John O. Peters (1936-) is the author of several books on Virginia and Richmond history.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Research files, 2010-2013, of John O. Peters (1936-) of Richmond, Virginia, for his book From Marshall to Moussaoui: Federal Justice in the Eastern District of Virginia. Papers include articles, clippings, emails, judicial opinions, manuscript drafts, notes, and other records documenting the history of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Virginia.

list.item: Series I: Manuscript proofs and drafts.

did.unittitle: Series I: Manuscript proofs and drafts.

scopecontent.p: Series I: Manuscript proofs and drafts contains drafts and proofs of From Marshall to Moussaoui: Federal Justice in the Eastern District of Virginia, as well as outlines for the manuscript.

Series II: Case research.

scopecontent.p: Series II: Case research contains judicial decisions by judges of the United District Court of the Eastern District of Virginia in various cases, along with supporting articles, clippings, and notes.

Series IV: Subject files.
